content.question: Based on the graph, which of the following best describes the development of transportation and communication in the twentieth century?

choices.label: New methods of transportation and communication became more affordable over time.
New technologies made transportation and communication more expensive over time.
Although methods of transportation became more expensive, methods of communication became less expensive over time.
Between 1980 and 1990, the cost of all forms of transportation and communication increased.

content.answer: New methods of transportation and communication became more affordable over time.
